attributes.title: Stop The Hindu Holocaust! Volume 5
attributes.description:
25 APR 2020

*PARAMASHIVA'S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*STOP THE HINDU HOLOCAUST.

*PARAMASHIVA TODAY WILL MANIFEST IN ALL OF US AS MEENAKSHI SUNDARESHWARA. 

*FROM TODAY, ALL OVER THE WORLD, ALL OF YOU WILL EXPERIENCE THE INTENSE POWER MANIFESTATION OF PARAMASHIVA AND PARASHAKTI AND MEENAKSHI SUNDARESHWARA, AS THE BRAHMOTSAVAM FESTIVAL BEGINS TODAY. THIS WILL BE THE INTENSE OF MANIFESTATION OF BEING OF PARAMASHIVA. 

*I WILL GIVE YOU THE MOST IMPORTANT POWERFUL COGNITIONS, UNDERSTANDINGS, ULTIMATE KNOWLEDGE.

*UNIVERSE ITSELF IS CONSCIOUSNESS. SCIENTISTS ARE YET TO CATCH UP. SCIENCE IS TOO YOUNG TO CATCH UP WITH THIS REVELATION, TO REACH THIS CONCLUSION. 

*SOMETHING IS CONSCIOUSNESS, SOMETHING IS MATTER, IS BINARY LOGIC, DELUSION. 

*UNIVERSE ITSELF IS A BEING, PURE MANIFESTATION OF CONSCIOUSNESS, INSIDE CONSCIOUSNESS, OF CONSCIOUSNESS, FROM CONSCIOUSNESS, ESTABLISHED IN CONSCIOUSNESS. I AM NOT GIVING ANY FICTION. I AM GIVING YOU THE ABSOLUTE TRUTH. 

*YOU ARE ALL CONSCIOUSNESS. UNIVERSE ITSELF IS CONSCIOUSNESS. THERE IS NO SEPARATE FORCE COMMANDING, DECIDING OTHER THAN THE UNIVERSE. THEN YOU MANIFEST ONLY THAT REALITY IN YOUR LIFE. 

*IF YOUR BRAIN STOPS ANALYSING, COGNISING YOU ARE CONSCIOUSNESS, YOU ARE INDESTRUCTIBLE, EVEN DURING THE GREAT DELUGE OR ICE AGE OR STONE AGE OR IRON AGE, AND THAT YOU DO NOT PERISH, BECOME DESTROYED, YOU MANIFEST THIS REALITY. THAT IS WHY I INSIST YOU UNDERSTAND HUMAN BEINGS. UNDERSTANDING YOUR BRAIN COGNISES YOU ARE CONSCIOUSNESS

*PEOPLE WHO TRY TO CONTROL YOU, WHETHER POLITICIANS OR ANYONE ELSE WHO WANT TO KEEP YOU UNDER THEIR CONTROL, YOU THINK YOU CAN BE SUBDUED, THAT YOU ARE JUST A CITIZEN WITH A SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER, UNDERSTAND, YOU ARE HARD WIRED, EQUIPPED. YOU DONâ€™T NEED ANYTHING AS EXTERNAL SUPPORT FROM OUTSIDE. 

*YOU ARE MADE OUT OF THE STUFF, THE MATERIAL THAT DOES NOT GET DESTROYED WHEN EVERYTHING ELSE GETS DESTROYED. YOU ARE OLDER AND GOING TO LIVE LONGER THAN THE SUN AND THE MOON AND THE PLANET YOU ARE SEEING.

*TAKE LITTLE TIME. AS PARAMASHIVA, TODAY I WILL INITIATE ALL OF YOU INTO THIS GREAT TRUTH: YOU ARE MADE OUT OF A MATERIAL WHICH IS ALIVE, CANNOT BE DESTROYED, WHICH IS OLDER THAN SUN MOON AND PLANET EARTH YOU ARE SEEING.

*START COGNISING THIS TRUTH. EVEN IF YOU MANIFEST ONE EXTRAORDINARY POWER BEYOND YOUR BLISS, BY INTERNALISING THIS ONE TRUTH: YOU ARE MADE OUT OF THE STUFF WHICH IS CONSCIOUSNESS AND YOU ARE GOING TO LIVE, YOU WILL START UNDERSTANDING THAT THE UNIVERSE ITSELF IS CONSCIOUSNESS. 

*YOU NEED TO GET OUT OF THE BRAINWASHING DONE TO YOU BY THE PEOPLE WHO WANT TO KEEP YOU UNDER CONTROL. THE TRUTH I AM GIVING YOU WILL LIBERATE YOU COMPLETELY. EVEN ONCE IF YOU RECOGNISE, YOU WILL BECOME ABSOLUTELY MATURE, EXTREMELY MATURE. 

*YOU ARE IMMORTAL. THE STUFF OUT OF WHICH YOUR IDENTITY IS MADE, THE MATERIAL OUT OF WHICH YOUR EXISTENCE IS CREATED IS THE MOST SUPERIOR STUFF OF THE UNIVERSE, BEST METAL, ULTIMATE UNIVERSE. IN THIS UNIVERSE, IS CONSCIOUSNESS, I MADE YOU OUT OF THAT MATERIAL. RE-COGNISE YOU ARE CONSCIOUSNESS CONSCIOUSLY. 

*DECIDE: YOU WILL COGNISE YOURSELF AS CONSCIOUSNESS.

*THIS WHOLE PARAMASHIVOHAM, I AM DEDICATING TO MAKE THE WHOLE WORLD RECOGNISE THE MATERIAL, BASE METAL OUT OF WHICH I MADE YOU ALL. YOU ALL MANIFEST FROM EXTREME GROUNDED EXPERIENCE OF FULFILLMENT AND BLISS. I AM NOT TEACHING YOU FANTASY OR BRAINWASHING.

*MY WHOLE CIVILIZATION IS IN DANGER DUE TO EXTREMELY GREEDY AND DELUDED HUMAN BEINGS.

*THEY ARE NOT UNDERSTANDING THAT EVEN IF THEY GRAB EVERYTHING, THEY ARE GOING TO LEAVE THIS AND MORE TO ME UNLESS THEY ARE MADE OUT OF THE STUFF WHICH IS THE ULTIMATE. 

*FOCUS ON THIS TODAY. INTERNALIZE THIS TODAY. YOU ARE MADE OUT OF THE STUFF THAT LIVES FOREVER.
